body_html:
@kingofthebongo2008 you might want to create separate branches with git checkout for each PR, and git cherry-pick the commits you want to each of the branches.
Do you mind closing the existing stacked PRs and sending us the new ones?
body_text:
@kingofthebongo2008 you might want to create separate branches with git checkout for each PR, and git cherry-pick the commits you want to each of the branches.
Do you mind closing the existing stacked PRs and sending us the new ones?
body:
@kingofthebongo2008 you might want to create separate branches with [`git checkout`](https://git-scm.com/docs/git-checkout) for each PR, and [`git cherry-pick`](https://git-scm.com/docs/git-cherry-pick) the commits you want to each of the branches.
Do you mind closing the existing stacked PRs and sending us the new ones?
